text: Hi. Is anyone else having issues with HubDB and filters? I'm working on the Real Estate Listing Tutorial <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-a-real-estate-listing-with-hubdb>, and even on their example page, the filters don't work <https://designers.HubSpot.com/real-estate-listing-example>. When I try the filters on my page, I get "Our website provider is having trouble loading this page."
